itunes:title: #193 - Online Courses
title: #193 - Online Courses
description:
Let's talk online courses! We've each had different online courses for different businesses in different formats, so in this episode of Being Boss, we're talking about the pros & cons of online courses, why you might want to utilize different formats of online course delivery, and how to get the most out of your online course.

This episode is sponsored by Freshbooks Cloud Accounting & Podia

Get full show notes for this episode here
